biotools.summary: RACLAHE (Region-Adaptive Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization) is an image enhancement method specifically designed for improving CNN-based segmentation of the prostate and prostatic zones in T2-Weighted MR images.

bioschemas.name: RACLAHE
bioschemas.summary: RACLAHE (Region-Adaptive Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization) is an image enhancement method specifically designed for improving CNN-based segmentation of the prostate and prostatic zones in T2-Weighted MR images.
